import axios from'axios';export function Create(ProductName,ProductCode,Img,UnitPrice,Qty,TotalPrice){var url="https://m-crudproject.herokuapp.com/product/createproduct";return axios.post(url,{ProductName:ProductName,ProductCode:ProductCode,Img:Img,UnitPrice:UnitPrice,Qty:Qty,TotalPrice:TotalPrice}).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return true;}else{return false;}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);return false;});}export function GetAll(){var url="https://m-crudproject.herokuapp.com/product/allproduct";return axios.get(url).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return res.data;//console.log(res.data);
}else{return false;}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);return false;});}export function getSingle(id){var url="https://m-crudproject.herokuapp.com/product/singleproduct/".concat(id);return axios.get(url).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return res.data;}else{return false;}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);return false;});}export function Delete(id){var url="https://m-crudproject.herokuapp.com/product/deleteproduct/".concat(id);return axios.delete(url).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return true;}else{return false;}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);return false;});}export function Update(id,ProductName,ProductCode,Img,UnitPrice,Qty,TotalPrice){var url="https://m-crudproject.herokuapp.com/product/updateproduct/".concat(id);axios.patch(url,{id:id,ProductName:ProductName,ProductCode:ProductCode,Img:Img,UnitPrice:UnitPrice,Qty:Qty,TotalPrice:TotalPrice}).then(function(res){if(res.status===200){return true;}else{return false;}}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);return false;});}
